step1.sentence: My grandmother swears by drinking a cup of warm lemon water every morning to stay healthy.

step2.story: After years of struggling with back pain, Marcus finally found relief through daily stretching. Now he swears by his morning yoga routine and recommends it to everyone he meets. His coworkers are starting to try it after seeing how much better he looks.

step3.story: Elena had tried every productivity app on the market, but nothing seemed to work for her scattered schedule. Then a colleague introduced her to a simple paper planner, and everything changed. Within weeks she was hitting her deadlines and feeling less overwhelmed. Now Elena swears by the old-fashioned method, insisting that writing things down by hand makes them stick in her memory. She keeps a stack of planners on her desk and gifts them to friends who complain about disorganization. For her, no digital tool has ever come close to matching the clarity that pen and paper provide.

meaning.realUsageKo: 실제로는 어떤 방법, 물건, 습관 등이 매우 효과적이라고 굳게 믿고 적극 추천할 때 사용한다. 개인적인 경험에서 우러나온 강한 확신을 표현한다.
meaning.etymologyKo: 맹세(swear)를 할 만큼 신뢰한다는 의미에서 유래했으며, 중세 영어의 서약 관습에서 비롯된 표현이다.
meaning.nuanceKo: 단순한 선호나 추천보다 훨씬 강한 확신을 나타내며, 직접 검증한 경험을 바탕으로 한다는 뉘앙스가 있다. 격식체와 비격식체 모두에서 자연스럽게 쓰인다.
meaning.shortExampleEn: She swears by this brand of sneakers for long-distance running.
meaning.shortExampleKo: 그녀는 장거리 달리기에는 이 브랜드의 운동화가 최고라고 굳게 믿는다.
